revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Sprout Tower |image = [[File:Sprout Tower.png]] |caption = An outside view of Sprout Tower. |tokens = 2,500 |location = Directly east of Violet City. }} '''Sprout Tower''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 56,735 |- | Bellsprout (boss) || 240,000 |}
==Pokémon==
* Ratatta * Gastly * Hoothoot * Bellsprout (boss)
==Items==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 50% |- | {{Bag3|X Click}} [[XClick|xClick]] || 25% |- | {{Bag3|Item Magnet}} [[Item Magnet]] || 25% |}
[[Category:Dungeons]]
